title: 15 minute figure drawing
alt: Pencil drawing of a person reclining, head turned away.

title: Weightless city
alt: Sun sets behind clouds in a bay surrounded by a city on hills. Fadded clouds hide part of the hill, making a floating city above.

title: Overpass
alt: Ink drawing of a dilapidated overpass over water.

title: Myself, age 38
alt: Portrait of a man, wearing glasses and a beard, with a pink shirt in front of a blue background.
